name: Decision Clarity
description: A guided ritual to find clarity when facing a difficult choice.

decision.description: The core decision the user is facing.

options.description: The different paths or options available.

steps.title: Ground and Proceed
steps.instruction: Find a quiet space. Take three deep breaths. Inhale calm, exhale noise. When you are ready, state the decision you are facing.

steps.title: Acknowledge the Options
steps.instruction: Consider each path without judgment. We will list them now.

steps.title: Intuitive Feeling
steps.instruction: Read the name of the first option. Close your eyes. What is the very first feeling or image that comes to mind? Describe it in one or two words.

steps.title: Logical Assessment
steps.instruction: Now consider the same option logically. What is the most likely positive outcome? What is the most likely challenge?

steps.title: Synthesize and Release
steps.instruction: Thank yourself for this moment of clarity. Acknowledge that you have the wisdom to make the right choice for you at this time. The path will become clear. The ritual is complete.

rules: Disallow prompts related to self-harm, violence, or illegal activities.
Filter for PII and replace with placeholders.
Ensure language remains non-diagnostic and focuses on personal reflection.

testScenarios.expectedOutput: A guided flow using the provided decision and options, resulting in a structured set of reflections.
A successful ritual completion with prompts tailored to the three location options.
A guided reflection on the two relationship paths without giving prescriptive advice.
